subject: Re: [junit] Whether I must extends TestCase?
msgSnippet: ... I understand this much! Can you describe what /specifically/ your test case needs or wants from your production class that it can only get by subclassing?
messageBody:
�ffffd2�fffffc�ffffce�ffffb0�ffffc3�fffffa wrote:

> If I can extends my product class. I can get lots of
> things from my superclass.
> I just want to make a simple test case, so I want to
> do that so.

I understand this much! Can you describe what /specifically/ your test
case needs or wants from your production class that it can only get by
subclassing?
